name: Cr4cked Earth: Scorched Dawn
description:
It is the year 2020, the widespread usage of fossil fuels has entirely destroyed the Earth's ozone space shield. The sun's rays blast Mother Earth with radiation and infinite heat, mutating and destroying all life that is slow moving and unable to escape. Humanity only clings to existence, mostly having been turned into sun burnt, hyper-aggressive freaks.

You are The Recycler, a remnant from the once great species, now reduced to a violent desert scavenger whom lives in perpetual night. Utilize weapons and vehicles from a bygone era in order to stay on the move, out of reach of the unforgiving star.
